text: the reality is there's so much change

technology and disruption
but even with that i think one of the
things that's happening is the
expectation of a cfo is very different
you have to really be thinking about let

happen let me let me help you look

let me help you put those headlights out
further and then i would take it a step
further
especially in technology right there's

and so as a modern cfo part of your job
is
how do you help make those choices to

so that's what i get excited about it's

we're thinking about the investment

what are the things that we're doing
